title: ‘Jonas Said His Hand Might Be Broken’: Vingegaard Crashes and Matteo Jorgenson Rides Back in Yellow Jersey
content:
Post-stage images captured Vingegaard grimacing in pain as he tried to remove his gloves and journalists reported that he broke down into tears, suggesting that the injury could be serious.

Read the full article at ‘Jonas Said His Hand Might Be Broken’: Vingegaard Crashes and Matteo Jorgenson Rides Back in Yellow Jersey on Velo.
